name: Spectrum Forces
description:
The Spectrum Forces have been commissioned to clear 3 planets from hordes of robots that have settled in. You'll have to compose 3 squads out of the Forces' 9 unique pilots to go and clear out the robotic menace in this experimental horizontal scrolling shoot-em-up.

Select the right pilots for the right jobs, use everyone, bring them all back alive, and enable challenges to get the highest scores you can!

Playthroughs usually take 15 to 20 minutes to complete successfully.
